metadata.dc:author: Rodríguez, R S
metadata.dc:description: The first case of mucocutaneous lymph node syndrome (MLNS) seen at the Hospital del Niño IMAN and probably in Mexico City is described. The guidelines for the diagnosis of the syndrome are outlined as well the differential diagnosis with other diseases.
metadata.dc:title: Síndrome linfomucocutáneo Presentación de un caso
[Mucocutaneous lymph node syndrome. Report of a case].
metadata.dc:publisher: Boletin medico del Hospital Infantil de Mexico
